item.title: ChatGPT’s second birthday: What will gen AI (and the world) look like in another 2 years?
item.description: We've come a long way in 2 years. Gen AI is the future, but how is it reshaping enterprise? And when will we reach AGI and superintelligence?

item.title: Here’s the one thing you should never outsource to an AI model
item.description: While it might be tempting, betting on gen AI to take over your R&D will likely backfire in significant, maybe even catastrophic, ways.

item.title: Sakana AI’s CycleQD outperforms traditional fine-tuning methods for multi-skill language models
item.description: CycleQD merges skills of experts models in clever ways to create many new models with multiple skills, no fine-tuning required.

item.title: Meta launches open source Llama 3.3, shrinking powerful bigger model into smaller size
item.description: The 70B-Llama 3.3 is specifically optimized for cost-effective inference, with token generation costs as low as $0.01 per million tokens.

item.title: Microsoft Copilot Vision is here, letting AI see what you do online
item.description: In the long run, the company may even expand these capabilities to other products in its ecosystem, allowing enterprise users to work and make decisio...
